fields.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
fields.description: A group of scientists in San Francisco struggle to stay alive in the aftermath of a plague that is wiping out humanity, while Caesar tries to maintain dominance over his community of intelligent apes

fields.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
fields.description: The ultimate X-Men ensemble fights a war for the survival of the species across two time periods as they join forces with their younger selves in an epic battle that must change the past â€“ to save our future.

fields.title: Despicable Me 2
fields.description: Gru is recruited by the Anti-Villain League to help deal with a powerful new super criminal.

fields.title: A Bug's Life
fields.description: On behalf of "oppressed bugs everywhere," an inventive ant named Flik hires a troupe of warrior bugs to defend his bustling colony from a horde of freeloading grasshoppers led by the evil-minded Hopper.

fields.title: Rush
fields.description: A biographical drama centered on the rivalry between Formula 1 drivers James Hunt and Niki Lauda during the 1976 Formula One motor-racing season.
